General.Name: Biomm S.A
General.Description: Biomm S.A. operates as a biotechnology company in Brazil. It offers AFREZZA, a human insulin inhalation powder; GHEMAXAN, an enoxaparina sodica; GLARGILIN, a glargine insulin; WOSULIN R, a human insulin; WOSULIN N, isphane insulin; HERZUMA, a trastuzumab; and CANETA LIFEPEN G PARA APLICACAO DE INSULINA. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Nova Lima, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua dos Pinheiros, 610, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 05422-001
